summary: This module implements low‑level utilities for performing numerical integration on a Uxarray grid. It computes arc lengths of cell edges, determines intersections of constant‑latitude lines with grid faces, calculates zonal weighting factors, and processes overlapping intervals, leveraging Numba for performance.
business_intent: Enable accurate and efficient calculation of zonal (latitude‑based) integrals and related metrics across unstructured grid cells, supporting scientific analyses that require precise area‑weighted integration of fields on the grid.
